result.execSummary:
The defendant Richard A Dexter was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Statutory court costs assessed.  Bond applied.

Counseling, treatment, services as deemed appropriate by agent. This may include cognitive intervention. 
Defendant must obey all rules and regulations of probation.
No contact with MMS until doctor and probation agent deems it appropriate.
Comply with any medication order.
DNA sample ordered.
Alcohol assessment and follow through with recommendations. No alcohol, random UA's at discretion of agent.

ADDRESS INFO for Richard A Dexter
Current: 424 N Pine St, Burlington, WI 53105   (Effective: 06-15-2015)
Prior: 33737 S Lakeshore Dr, Burlington, WI 53105
Status conference on August 11, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on July 16, 2015 at 03:15 pm.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  No contact with the victim MMS (person, property, residence or family).   It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any  alcohol.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.  The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.   Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Richard A Dexter in court with attorney Joshua Hargrove.  Defendant Richard A Dexter in custody.  Sharon Ann Riek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Mark Garvin.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 16, 2015 at 03:15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for August 11, 2015 at 08:30 am.
